---
title: "cq-patient-data.ts"
---

## High-level description
The code defines TypeScript types for representing and interacting with Carequality (CQ) patient data, including patient links, linked gateways, and associated demographics history. These types are used for data storage and retrieval related to Carequality patient discovery and document query operations.

## Code Structure
The code defines several types related to Carequality patient data:
- `CQExternalPatient`: Represents basic patient information from an external system.
- `CQLinkedGateway`: Represents a Carequality gateway with its OID and URL.
- `CQLink`: Combines external patient information with gateway details.
- `CQData`: Encapsulates Carequality-specific data, including links and demographics history.
- `CQPatientDataCreate`: Interface for creating new Carequality patient data records.
- `CQPatientDataCreatePartial`: Interface for partially updating existing records.
- `CQPatientData`: Extends the base domain interface with Carequality-specific data.

## Symbols

### `CQExternalPatient`
#### Description
A TypeScript type representing basic patient information from an external system, as retrieved from Carequality.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patientId | string | The ID of the patient in the external system. |
| systemId | string | The ID of the external system. |
| patientResource | PatientResource (optional) | The FHIR Patient resource associated with the patient. |

### `CQLinkedGateway`
#### Description
A TypeScript type representing a Carequality gateway with its Object Identifier (OID) and URL.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| oid | string | The Object Identifier (OID) of the Carequality gateway. |
| url | string | The URL of the Carequality gateway. |

### `CQLink`
#### Description
A TypeScript type that combines external patient information (`CQExternalPatient`) with Carequality gateway details (`CQLinkedGateway`).

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patientId | string | The ID of the patient in the external system. |
| systemId | string | The ID of the external system. |
| patientResource | PatientResource (optional) | The FHIR Patient resource associated with the patient. |
| oid | string | The Object Identifier (OID) of the Carequality gateway. |
| url | string | The URL of the Carequality gateway. |

### `CQData`
#### Description
A TypeScript type that encapsulates Carequality-specific data for a patient.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| links | CQLink[] | An array of `CQLink` objects representing the patient's links to external systems via Carequality. |
| linkDemographicsHistory | LinkDemographicsHistory (optional) | A history of patient demographics retrieved from linked systems, keyed by request ID. |

### `CQPatientDataCreate`
#### Description
An interface defining the required properties for creating a new `CQPatientData` record.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| cxId | string | The ID of the customer. |
| data | CQData | The Carequality-specific data for the patient. |

### `CQPatientDataCreatePartial`
#### Description
An interface defining the properties that can be partially updated in an existing `CQPatientData` record.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| cxId | string | The ID of the customer. |
| data | Partial&lt;CQData&gt; | The Carequality-specific data to update, allowing for partial updates. |

### `CQPatientData`
#### Description
An interface representing a complete `CQPatientData` record, extending the `BaseDomain` interface with Carequality-specific data.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| id | string | The ID of the record. |
| cxId | string | The ID of the customer. |
| data | CQData | The Carequality-specific data for the patient. |
| createdAt | Date | The date and time the record was created. |
| updatedAt | Date | The date and time the record was last updated. |
| eTag | string | An entity tag for optimistic concurrency control. |


## References
- `BaseDomain`: This type is defined in `@metriport/core/domain/base-domain`.
- `LinkDemographicsHistory`: This type is defined in `@metriport/core/domain/patient-demographics`.
- `PatientResource`: This type is defined in `@metriport/ihe-gateway-sdk`.
